item.title: Furniture and rubbish dumped on pavement, 22nd February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forman Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Concrete bollard knocked down again by driver, 22nd February
item.description:

item.title: Waste dumped on streets daily, 22nd February
item.description:
Waste dumped on streets again, often next to public bins and lampposts. These split and it is now disgusting litter all the way from DIY shop and round the corner to 118 Westcombe Park Road. Weekly street clean is not enough. And they only tackle the pavement- there is litter and build up of leaf mush (from October) under parked cars on Westcombe Park Road causing blocked drainage and large water puddles form when it rains The daily dumping of waste on the street must Be stopped

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westcombe Hill, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road collision debris on pedestrian crossing, 22nd February
item.description:
At junction of Kentish Way/Tweedy Road/Widmore Rd - large amount of road traffic debris swept onto pedestrian crossing. Whole area untidy and still bits of debris in the road. Please can this be cleared and made safe
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tweedy Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
